channel.title: Dialogue help

item.title: Dialogue help
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

How can I make it so you can either make a iron whip from a bronze whip or a normal whip? And not just one?

if(c.NpcDialogue == 151 && c.playerHasItem(4151, 1)){
c.NpcDialogue = 155;
c.NpcDialogueSend = false;
c.deleteItem(4151, 1);
c.addItem(8018, 1);
}

if(c.NpcDialogue == 151 && !c.playerHasItem(4151, 1)){
c.NpcDialogue = 153;
c.NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

but how can I make it so you can make an iron whip from the ID: 8019 too?

Read full topic
